and here its my code

entitydef:if(i == 1382) {
entityDef.name = “Glacor”;
entityDef.anIntArray94 = new int[]{58940};

entityDef.walkAnim = 10901;
entityDef.actions = new String[]{null, “Attack”, null, null, null};

entityDef.anInt91 = 123;

}
if(i == 1383) {

if(i == 1385) {
